lines.text: Fear is very bad for my seams.
Interesting transport pod. What's your power source?
A dollar on the drop, and ten cents for each additional mile.
Oh, get off the track, Jack.
Sorry, the number you have dialed is no longer in service.
Well, Cruiser's the name, and speed is my game.
Oh, it, it could be dangerous.
Heh, baby, you just said the magic word.
It was terrible. Even worse then when I was got put in the washing machine.
You dare to touch the Queen? Inhabitants of many planets have died for less!
We're friends, but it's not a perfect relationship.
Oh, really, this could go on all night. I mean, we're not doing any good standing here. Hey, why don't you and I just roll on back to the playroom?
Well, Rugby, last Christmas may have been the most wonderful day in your life, but it was a terrible day for someone else. Do you know who I'm talking about?
I don't know, and I don't care!
